attributes.action: Ensure the parents of Madeleine McCann are prosecuted for causing this issue
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is NO offensive language so petition should not be rejected on those grounds

Madeleine McCann has been kidnapped, this is a fact that I am sure the whole country is aware of, whilst not wishing to appear heartless to her plight, if her parents had not abandoned her then this would not have occured, regardless of the eventual outcome of the search, I believe her parents should be held fully accountable for all the costs they have caused by abandoning thier own child.

Their action has now cost millions in terms of both actual money and man power diverting police investigations from other serious crime all because they made a choice to desert their child and go out on their own.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
